Articles.Content: I had done a manned mission to duna awhile ago and when I went and did EVA with Valentina I noticed my kerbal cloned it self and the clone just floated off the ship and flew away. I finished with the mission and went to the astronaut complex and noticed a problem. As you can see if the bug wasn't there I would not have 10/12 on the top. Also I cant enlist kerbals. I'm not that great at looking through 90000 lines of code for something, and I found other forum pages showing the same problem but they were in older versions so Idk. Thanks for the help.
